ayas.arabic: وَٱلطُّورِ
ayas.translation: I swear by the Mountain,
ayas.transliteration: waṭ ṭūr

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.

ayas.arabic: وَكِتَـٰبٍ مَّسْطُورٍ
ayas.translation: And the Book written
ayas.transliteration: wakitābin masṭūr

ayas.arabic: فِى رَقٍّ مَّنشُورٍ
ayas.translation: In an outstretched fine parchment,
ayas.transliteration: fī raqqin manshūr

ayas.arabic: وَٱلْبَيْتِ ٱلْمَعْمُورِ
ayas.translation: And the House (Kaaba) that is visited,
ayas.transliteration: wal baytil ma`mūr

ayas.arabic: وَٱلسَّقْفِ ٱلْمَرْفُوعِ
ayas.translation: And the elevated canopy
ayas.transliteration: was saqfil marfū`

ayas.arabic: وَٱلْبَحْرِ ٱلْمَسْجُورِ
ayas.translation: And the swollen sea
ayas.transliteration: wal baḥril masjūr

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَٰقِعٌ
ayas.translation: Most surely the punishment of your Lord will come to pass;
ayas.transliteration: inna `adhāba rabbika lawāqi`

ayas.arabic: مَّا لَهُۥ مِن دَافِعٍ
ayas.translation: There shall be none to avert it;
ayas.transliteration: mā lahu min dāfi`

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَ تَمُورُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ مَوْرًا
ayas.translation: On the day when the heaven shall move from side to side
ayas.transliteration: yawma tamūrus samā-u mawrā

ayas.arabic: وَتَسِيرُ ٱلْجِبَالُ سَيْرًا
ayas.translation: And the mountains shall pass away passing away (altogether).
ayas.transliteration: watasīrul jibālu sayrā

ayas.arabic: فَوَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayas.translation: So woe on that day to those who reject (the truth),
ayas.transliteration: fawaylun yawma-idhin lil-mukadhhibīn

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى خَوْضٍ يَلْعَبُونَ
ayas.translation: Those who sport entering into vain discourses.
ayas.transliteration: alladhīna hum fī khawḍiy yal`abūn

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
ayas.translation: The day on which they shall be driven away to the fire of hell with violence.
ayas.transliteration: yawma yuda``ūna ilā nāri jahannama da``ā

ayas.arabic: هَـٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
ayas.translation: This is the fire which you used to give the lie to.
ayas.transliteration: hādhihin nārul latī kuntum bihā tukadhhibūn

ayas.arabic: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَـٰذَآ أَمْ أَنتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
ayas.translation: Is it magic then or do you not see?
ayas.transliteration: afasiḥrun hādhā am antum lā tubṣirūn

ayas.arabic: ٱصْلَوْهَا فَٱصْبِرُوٓا۟ أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: Enter into it, then bear (it) patiently, or do not bear (it) patiently, it is the same to you; you shall be requited only (for) what you did.
ayas.transliteration: iṣ-lawhā faṣbirū aw lā taṣbirū sawā-un `alaykum ۖ innamā tujzawna mā kuntum ta`malūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَنَعِيمٍ
ayas.translation: Surely those who guard (against evil) shall be in gardens and bliss
ayas.transliteration: innal muttaqīna fī jannātin wana`īm

ayas.arabic: فَـٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
ayas.translation: Rejoicing because of what their Lord gave them, and their Lord saved them from the punishment of the burning fire.
ayas.transliteration: fākihīna bimā ātāhum rabbuhum wawaqāhum rabbuhum `adhābal jaḥīm

ayas.arabic: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: Eat and drink pleasantly for what you did,
ayas.transliteration: kulū washrabū hanī-an bimā kuntum ta`malūn

ayas.arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَّصْفُوفَةٍ ۖ وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
ayas.translation: Reclining on thrones set in lines, and We will unite them to large-eyed beautiful ones.
ayas.transliteration: muttaki-īna `alā sururin maṣfūfah ۖ wazawwajnāhum biḥūrin `īn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَـٰنٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَآ أَلَتْنَـٰهُم مِّنْ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَىْءٍ ۚ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٌ
ayas.translation: And (as for) those who believe and their offspring follow them in faith, We will unite with them their offspring and We will not diminish to them aught of their work; every man is responsible for what he shall have wrought.
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna āmanū wattaba`at-hum dhurriyyatuhum bi-iymānin alḥaqnā bihim dhurriyyatahum wa mā alatnāhum min `amalihim min shay-ī ۚ kullum-ri-in bimā kasaba rahīn

ayas.arabic: وَأَمْدَدْنَـٰهُم بِفَـٰكِهَةٍ وَلَحْمٍ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
ayas.translation: And We will aid them with fruit and flesh such as they desire.
ayas.transliteration: wa-amdadnāhum bifākihatin walaḥmin mimmā yashtahūn

ayas.arabic: يَتَنَـٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا لَّا لَغْوٌ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأْثِيمٌ
ayas.translation: They shall pass therein from one to another a cup wherein there shall be nothing vain nor any sin.
ayas.transliteration: yatanāza`ūna fīhā ka-sal lā laghwun fīhā walā ta-thīm

ayas.arabic: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌ لَّهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌ مَّكْنُونٌ
ayas.translation: And round them shall go boys of theirs as if they were hidden pearls.
ayas.transliteration: wayaṭūfu `alayhim ghil-mānul lahum ka-annahum lu-lu-un maknūn

ayas.arabic: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
ayas.translation: And some of them shall advance towards others questioning each other.
ayas.transliteration: wa-aqbala ba`ḍuhum `alā ba`ḍiy yatasā-alūn

ayas.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِىٓ أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ
ayas.translation: Saying: Surely we feared before on account of our families:
ayas.transliteration: qālū innā kunnā qablu fī ahlinā mushfiqīn

ayas.arabic: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ
ayas.translation: But Allah has been gracious to us and He has saved us from the punishment of the hot wind:
ayas.transliteration: famannallāhu `alaynā wawaqānā `adhābas samūm

ayas.arabic: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبْلُ نَدْعُوهُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayas.translation: Surely we called upon Him before: Surely He is the Benign, the Merciful.
ayas.transliteration: innā kunnā min qablu nad`ūh ۖ innahu huwal barrur raḥīm

ayas.arabic: فَذَكِّرْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٍ وَلَا مَجْنُونٍ
ayas.translation: Therefore continue to remind, for by the grace of your Lord, you are not a soothsayer, or a madman.
ayas.transliteration: fadhakkir famā anta bini`mati rabbika bikāhinin walā majnūn

ayas.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٌ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيْبَ ٱلْمَنُونِ
ayas.translation: Or do they say: A poet, we wait for him the evil accidents of time.
ayas.transliteration: am yaqūlūna shā`irun natarabbaṣu bihi raybal manūn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا۟ فَإِنِّى مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
ayas.translation: Say: Wait, for surely I too with you am of those who wait.
ayas.transliteration: qul tarabbaṣū fa-innī ma`akum minal mutarabbiṣīn

ayas.arabic: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَـٰمُهُم بِهَـٰذَآ ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
ayas.translation: Nay! do their understandings bid them this? Or are they an inordinate people?
ayas.transliteration: am ta-muruhum aḥlāmuhum bihādhā ۚ am hum qawmun ṭāghūn

ayas.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayas.translation: Or do they say: He has forged it. Nay! they do not believe.
ayas.transliteration: am yaqūlūna taqawwalah ۚ bal lā yu-minūn

ayas.arabic: فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ بِحَدِيثٍ مِّثْلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَـٰدِقِينَ
ayas.translation: Then let them bring an announcement like it if they are truthful.
ayas.transliteration: falya-tū biḥadīthin mithlihi in kānū ṣādiqīn

ayas.arabic: أَمْ خُلِقُوا۟ مِنْ غَيْرِ شَىْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقُونَ
ayas.translation: Or were they created without there being anything, or are they the creators?
ayas.transliteration: am khuliqū min ghayri shay-in am humul khāliqūn

ayas.arabic: أَمْ خَلَقُوا۟ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ ۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ
ayas.translation: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Nay! they have no certainty.
ayas.transliteration: am khalaqus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۚ bal lā yūqinūn

ayas.arabic: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْمُصَۣيْطِرُونَ
ayas.translation: Or have they the treasures of your Lord with them? Or have they been set in absolute authority?
ayas.transliteration: am `indahum khazā-inu rabbika am humul musayṭirūn

ayas.arabic: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّمٌ يَسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُهُم بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
ayas.translation: Or have they the means by which they listen? Then let their listener bring a clear authority.
ayas.transliteration: am lahum sullamun yastami`ūna fīh ۖ falya-ti mustami`uhum bisulṭānin mubīn

ayas.arabic: أَمْ لَهُ ٱلْبَنَـٰتُ وَلَكُمُ ٱلْبَنُونَ
ayas.translation: Or has He daughters while you have sons?
ayas.transliteration: am lahul banātu walakumul banūn

ayas.arabic: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ
ayas.translation: Or do you ask them for a reward, so that they are overburdened by a debt?
ayas.transliteration: am tas-aluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muthqalūn

ayas.arabic: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
ayas.translation: Or have they the unseen so that they write (it) down?
ayas.transliteration: am `indahumul ghaybu fahum yaktubūn

ayas.arabic: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْدًا ۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْمَكِيدُونَ
ayas.translation: Or do they desire a war? But those who disbelieve shall be the vanquished ones in war.
ayas.transliteration: am yurīdūna kaydā ۖ fal ladhīna kafarū humul makīdūn

ayas.arabic: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ غَيْرُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
ayas.translation: Or have they a god other than Allah? Glory be to Allah from what they set up (with Him).
ayas.transliteration: am lahum ilāhun ghayrullāh ۚ subḥānallāhi `ammā yushrikūn

ayas.arabic: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ كِسْفًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطًا يَقُولُوا۟ سَحَابٌ مَّرْكُومٌ
ayas.translation: And if they should see a portion of the heaven coming down, they would say: Piled up clouds.
ayas.transliteration: wa in yaraw kisfan minas samā-i sāqiṭan yaqūlū saḥābun markūm

ayas.arabic: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ
ayas.translation: Leave them then till they meet that day of theirs wherein they shall be made to swoon (with terror):
ayas.transliteration: fadharhum ḥattā yulāqū yawmahumul ladhī fīhi yuṣ`aqūn

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
ayas.translation: The day on which their struggle shall not avail them aught, nor shall they be helped.
ayas.transliteration: yawma lā yughnī `anhum kayduhum shay-an walā hum yunṣarūn

ayas.arabic: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ عَذَابًا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: And surely those who are unjust shall have a punishment besides that (in the world), but most of them do not know.
ayas.transliteration: wa inna lilladhīna ẓalamū `adhāban dūna dhālika walākinna aktharahum lā ya`lamūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا ۖ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
ayas.translation: And wait patiently for the judgment of your Lord, for surely you are before Our eyes, and sing the praise of your Lord when you rise;
ayas.transliteration: waṣbir liḥukmi rabbika fa-innaka bi-a`yuninā ۖ wasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika ḥīna taqūm

ayas.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَإِدْبَـٰرَ ٱلنُّجُومِ
ayas.translation: And in the night, give Him glory too, and at the setting of the stars.
ayas.transliteration: wa minal layli fasabbiḥ-hu wa idbāran nujūm
